title: HIOCOIN
author: HIOCOIN
content: For many years the HINO project has been advancing from a simple website to a team of anonymous people working under one purpose.Thus came two cryptocurrencies that were tested several times, rebuilt, until arriving at one of them today.It started in 2017 with HIOcoin, full of problems and flaws, very primitive but now we have the following coins.Darkcoin (DRC)Bitcoin White (BTCW)Each one with its characteristics, here we are presenting the DRC or Darkcoin, which brings the premise of being decentralized and bringing the idea of counter corrupt system. We know that crypto emerged to get rid of this controlling and centralizing system, in particular the DRC is totally against corruption and the rottenness of this system.Algorithm; Scrypt Proof of Work and Proof of StakePublic address letter; DBlock reward; 100 coinsBlock reward (PoS); 100 coinsLast PoW block; block 10000Min. stake age; 1 hourMax. stake age; UnlimitedCoinbase maturity; 1 (+ 1 default confirmation) blocksTarget spacing; 1 minuteTarget timespan; 1 minuteTransaction confirmations; 1 (+ 1 default confirmation) blocksACCOUNT CORRUPT BANKS AND GOVERNMENTSMining and automatic installationhttps://github.com/BitcoinWhiteBTCW/Darkcoin/blob/Bitcoin-White-BTCW/darkcoin-auto.zipWallet and minig altoRemember to BlackCoin.https://github.com/BitcoinWhiteBTCW/Darkcoin/blob/Bitcoin-White-BTCW/darkcoin-auto.zip

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Where is the url of your simple website? Any link to the blockchain explorer?
